te nvaya jñāna pakṣa ūrdhva sva bhū duḥkha ādi gocarāḥ
abhibhvāyatanāni aṣṭau dvayam ādya vimokṣa vat

original: dve dvitīyavat anyāni punaḥ śubhavimokṣavat // VAkK_8.35 //
analyzed: dve dvitīya vat anyāni punar śubha vimokṣa vat

original: daśa kṛtsnāni alobhāṣṭau dhyāne 'ntye gocaraḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: daśa kṛtsnāni alobha aṣṭau dhyāne ntye gocaraḥ punar
nirodhaḥ uktaḥ vairāgya prayoga āptam tu śeṣitam
tri dhātu āśrayam ārūpya saṃjñam śeṣam manuṣya jam
hetu karma bālāt dhātvoḥ ārupya utpādanam dvayoḥ

original: dhyānānāṃ rūpadhātau tu tābhyāṃ dharmatayāpi ca // VAkK_8.38 //
analyzed: dhyānānām rūpa dhātau tu tābhyām dharmatayā api ca
saddharmaḥ dvividhaḥ śāstuḥ āgama adhigama ātmakaḥ

original: dhātārastasya vaktāraḥ pratipattāra eva ca // VAkK_8.39 //
analyzed: dhātāraḥ tasya vaktāraḥ pratipattāraḥ eva ca
kāśmīra vaibhāṣika nīti siddhaḥ prāyas mayā ayam kathitaḥ bhidharmaḥ

original: yaddurguhītaṃ tadihāsmadāgaḥ saddharmanītau munayaḥ pramāṇam // VAkK_8.40 //
analyzed: yat durguhītam tat iha asmad āgaḥ saddharma nītau munayaḥ pramāṇam

original: nimīlite śāstari lokacakṣuṣi kṣayaṃ gate sākṣijane ca bhūyasā /
analyzed: nimīlite śāstari loka cakṣuṣi kṣayam gate sākṣi jane ca bhūyasā
adṛṣṭa tattvaiḥ niravagrahaiḥ kṛtam ku tārkikaiḥ śāsanam etat ākulam

original: gate 'tha śāntiṃ paramāṃ svayaṃbhuvi svayaṃbhuvaḥ śāsanadhūrdhareṣu ca /
analyzed: gate tha śāntim paramām svayaṃbhuvi svayaṃbhuvaḥ śāsana dhūrdhareṣu ca

original: jagatyanāthe gaṇaghātibhirmataiḥ niraṅkuśaiḥ svairamihādya caryate // VAkK_8.42 //
analyzed: jagati anāthe gaṇa ghātibhiḥ mataiḥ niraṅkuśaiḥ svairam iha adya caryate
iti kaṇṭha gata prāṇam viditvā śāsanam muneḥ

original: balakālaṃ malānāṃ ca na pramādyaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ // VAkK_8.43 //
analyzed: bala kālam malānām ca na pramādyam mumukṣubhiḥ
abhidharmakośe samāpattinirdeśaḥ nāma aṣṭama kośa sthānam iti
